category: Member city/provincial sports association regulations/Article 37 (Establishment of various committees)
contents: Article 37 (Establishment of various committees) ① City/provincial sports councils establish various committees, such as the School Sports Committee and the Living Sports Committee, as advisory bodies to the board of directors in order to carry out business and achieve goals. ② City/provincial sports associations may, if necessary, establish committees other than those in paragraph (1) by resolution of the board of directors. ③ Committee members cannot concurrently serve as members of other committees of the relevant city/provincial sports association. Revised on March 23, 2017, February 4, 2021, and October 6, 2021. ④ Matters necessary for the composition and operation of various committees under paragraph (1) shall be separately determined by the city/provincial sports council in accordance with the regulations of the relevant committee of the sports council.
